description: This JSON file contains weekly inventory levels for GLN plast.

week.description: Week number in the planning period.

inventory_OH.description: On-hand inventory at the end of the week (kg).

inventory_IT.description: Inventory in transit from the supplier to the destination (kg).

inventory_FI_E3.description: Finished inventory at location E3 (number of units).

inventory_FI_C3.description: Finished inventory at location C3 (number of units).
